title: Exploratory Analysis
text:
load('bar_graph_data.RData')

library(ggpubr)
library(haven)
library(tidyverse)

── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ──
✔ dplyr     1.1.4     ✔ readr     2.1.5
✔ forcats   1.0.0     ✔ stringr   1.5.1
✔ lubridate 1.9.3     ✔ tibble    3.2.1
✔ purrr     1.0.2     ✔ tidyr     1.3.1
── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ──
✖ dplyr::filter() masks plotly::filter(), stats::filter()
✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
ℹ Use the conflicted package (<http://conflicted.r-lib.org/>) to force all conflicts to become errors

library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(forcats)
library(viridis)

Loading required package: viridisLite

plt1<-ggplot(survey_data_2022_cleaner,aes(x=Year,fill=Q5_1))+
  geom_bar()+
  scale_fill_manual(values = c(
     "Extremely Important"  = "#7b3294",
     "Very Important"       = "#984ea3",
     "Somewhat Important"   = "#a05260", 
     "Not Too Important"    = "#905d5d",
     "Not At All Important" = "#984ea3",
     "No Response" = 'lightgrey'))+
  facet_grid(~MUSEUMTYPE)+
  theme_minimal()+labs(title="How important to you is it that your museum currently serves in the following capacity:The museum regularly acquires artwork?")


plt2<-ggplot(survey_data_2020_cleaner,aes(x=Year,fill=Q7_1))+
  geom_bar()+
   scale_fill_manual(values = c(
     "Extremely Important"  = "#7b3294",
     "Very Important"       = "#984ea3",
     "Somewhat Important"   = "#a05260", 
     "Not Too Important"    = "#905d5d",
     "Not At All Important" = "#984ea3",
     "No Response" = 'lightgrey'))+ 

  facet_grid(~MUSEUMTYPE)+
  theme_minimal()+labs(title="How important to you is it that your museum currently serves in the following capacity:The museum regularly acquires artwork?")

plt3<-ggarrange(plt2,plt1,ncol = 2, nrow = 2)

print(plt3)









plt4<-ggplot(survey_data_2022_cleaner,aes(x=Year,fill=Q5_2))+
  geom_bar()+
  scale_fill_manual(values = c(
     "Extremely Important"  = "#7b3294",
     "Very Important"       = "#984ea3",
     "Somewhat Important"   = "#a05260", 
     "Not Too Important"    = "#905d5d",
     "Not At All Important" = "#984ea3",
     "No Response" = 'lightgrey'))+
  facet_grid(~MUSEUMTYPE)+
  theme_minimal() + labs(title="How important to you is it that your museum currently displays artwork from its permanent collections")


plt5<-ggplot(survey_data_2020_cleaner,aes(x=Year,fill=Q7_2))+
  geom_bar()+
   scale_fill_manual(values = c(
     "Extremely Important"  = "#7b3294",
     "Very Important"       = "#984ea3",
     "Somewhat Important"   = "#a05260", 
     "Not Too Important"    = "#905d5d",
     "Not At All Important" = "#984ea3",
     "No Response" = 'lightgrey'))+ #
  facet_grid(~MUSEUMTYPE)+
  theme_minimal()+labs(title="How important to you is it that your museum currently displays artwork from its permanent collections")

plt6<-ggarrange(plt4,plt5,ncol = 2, nrow = 2)


plt7<-ggplot(survey_data_2022_cleaner,aes(x=Year,fill=Q6_1))+
  geom_bar()+
  scale_fill_manual(values = c(
     "Extremely Important"  = "#7b3294",
     "Very Important"       = "#984ea3",
     "Somewhat Important"   = "#a05260", 
     "Not Too Important"    = "#905d5d",
     "Not At All Important" = "#984ea3",
     "No Response" = 'lightgrey'))+
  facet_grid(~MUSEUMTYPE)+
  theme_minimal()+labs(title="How important to you is it that your museum will serve in the following capacity in five years: regularly acquire artwork?")


plt8<-ggplot(survey_data_2020_cleaner,aes(x=Year,fill=Q8_1))+
  geom_bar()+
   scale_fill_manual(values = c(
     "Extremely Important"  = "#7b3294",
     "Very Important"       = "#984ea3",
     "Somewhat Important"   = "#a05260", 
     "Not Too Important"    = "#905d5d",
     "Not At All Important" = "#984ea3",
     "No Response" = 'lightgrey'))+ #
  facet_grid(~MUSEUMTYPE)+
  theme_minimal()+labs(title="How important to you is it that your museum will serve in the following capacity in five years: regularly acquire artwork?")

plt9<-ggarrange(plt7,plt8,ncol = 2, nrow = 2)


plt10<-ggplot(survey_data_2022_cleaner,aes(x=Year,fill=Q6_2))+
  geom_bar()+
  scale_fill_manual(values = c(
     "Extremely Important"  = "#7b3294",
     "Very Important"       = "#984ea3",
     "Somewhat Important"   = "#a05260", 
     "Not Too Important"    = "#905d5d",
     "Not At All Important" = "#984ea3",
     "No Response" = 'lightgrey'))+
  facet_grid(~MUSEUMTYPE)+
  theme_minimal()+labs(title="How important to you is it that your museum will serve in the following capacity in five years:display artwork from its permanent collections?")


plt11<-ggplot(survey_data_2020_cleaner,aes(x=Year,fill=Q8_2))+
  geom_bar()+
   scale_fill_manual(values = c(
     "Extremely Important"  = "#7b3294",
     "Very Important"       = "#984ea3",
     "Somewhat Important"   = "#a05260", 
     "Not Too Important"    = "#905d5d",
     "Not At All Important" = "#984ea3",
     "No Response" = 'lightgrey'))+ #
  facet_grid(~MUSEUMTYPE)+
  theme_minimal()+labs(title="How important to you is it that your museum will serve in the following capacity in five years:display artwork from its permanent collections?")

plt12<-ggarrange(plt10,plt11,ncol = 2, nrow = 2)


plt13<-ggplot(survey_data_2022_cleaner,aes(x=Year,fill=Q6_4))+
  geom_bar()+
  scale_fill_manual(values = c(
     "Extremely Important"  = "#7b3294",
     "Very Important"       = "#984ea3",
     "Somewhat Important"   = "#a05260", 
     "Not Too Important"    = "#905d5d",
     "Not At All Important" = "#984ea3",
     "No Response" = 'lightgrey'))+
  facet_grid(~MUSEUMTYPE)+
  theme_minimal()+labs(title="How important to you is it that your museum will serve in the following capacity in five years: The museum ensures the conservation of its collections for the long-term future")


plt14<-ggplot(survey_data_2020_cleaner,aes(x=Year,fill=Q8_4))+
  geom_bar()+
   scale_fill_manual(values = c(
     "Extremely Important"  = "#7b3294",
     "Very Important"       = "#984ea3",
     "Somewhat Important"   = "#a05260", 
     "Not Too Important"    = "#905d5d",
     "Not At All Important" = "#984ea3",
     "No Response" = 'lightgrey'))+ #
  facet_grid(~MUSEUMTYPE)+
  theme_minimal()+labs(title="How important to you is it that your museum will serve in the following capacity in five years: The museum ensures the conservation of its collections for the long-term future")

plt15<-ggarrange(plt13,plt14,ncol = 2, nrow = 2)


plt16<-ggplot(survey_data_2022_cleaner,aes(x=Year,fill=Q8_9))+
  geom_bar()+
  scale_fill_manual(values = c(
     "Extremely Important"  = "#7b3294",
     "Very Important"       = "#984ea3",
     "Somewhat Important"   = "#a05260", 
     "Not Too Important"    = "#905d5d",
     "Not At All Important" = "#984ea3",
     "No Response" = 'lightgrey'))+
  facet_grid(~MUSEUMTYPE)+
  theme_minimal()+labs(title="How much of a priority do you think each of the following equity, diversity, and inclusion strategies are in the art museum sector as a whole?:Increasing the diversity of staff in senior management positions")


plt17<-ggplot(survey_data_2020_cleaner,aes(x=Year,fill=Q10_9))+
  geom_bar()+
   scale_fill_manual(values = c(
     "Extremely Important"  = "#7b3294",
     "Very Important"       = "#984ea3",
     "Somewhat Important"   = "#a05260", 
     "Not Too Important"    = "#905d5d",
     "Not At All Important" = "#984ea3",
     "No Response" = 'lightgrey'))+ #
  facet_grid(~MUSEUMTYPE)+
  theme_minimal()+labs(title="How much of a priority do you think each of the following equity, diversity, and inclusion strategies are in the art museum sector as a whole?:Increasing the diversity of staff in senior management positions")

plt18<-ggarrange(plt16,plt17,ncol = 2, nrow = 2)


plt19<-ggplot(survey_data_2022_cleaner,aes(x=Year,fill=Q8_11))+
  geom_bar()+
  scale_fill_manual(values = c(
     "Extremely Important"  = "#7b3294",
     "Very Important"       = "#984ea3",
     "Somewhat Important"   = "#a05260", 
     "Not Too Important"    = "#905d5d",
     "Not At All Important" = "#984ea3",
     "No Response" = 'lightgrey'))+
  facet_grid(~MUSEUMTYPE)+
  theme_minimal()+labs(title="How much of a priority do you think each of the following equity, diversity, and inclusion strategies are in the art museum sector as a whole?:Increasing the diversity of museum volunteers")


plt20<-ggplot(survey_data_2020_cleaner,aes(x=Year,fill=Q10_10))+
  geom_bar()+
   scale_fill_manual(values = c(
     "Extremely Important"  = "#7b3294",
     "Very Important"       = "#984ea3",
     "Somewhat Important"   = "#a05260", 
     "Not Too Important"    = "#905d5d",
     "Not At All Important" = "#984ea3",
     "No Response" = 'lightgrey'))+ #
  facet_grid(~MUSEUMTYPE)+
  theme_minimal()+labs(title="How much of a priority do you think each of the following equity, diversity, and inclusion strategies are in the art museum sector as a whole?:Increasing the diversity of museum volunteers")

plt21<-ggarrange(plt19,plt20,ncol = 2, nrow = 2)

title: Art Museum Director Semtiments on Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion as seen in Surveys from 2020 and 2022

load('bar_graph_data.RData')

library(ggpubr)
library(haven)
library(tidyverse)
